newsitem.title: USA: PRESS DIGEST - Washington Post business - Dec 10.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Washington Post business - Dec 10.

text.p: The Washington Post carried the following items on the front page of its business section on Dec. 10:
NEW YORK - Investors pushed stock prices to the highest one-day gain in a month.
WASHINGTON - Giant Food Inc. has filed a suit to prevent M&T Bank N.A. of Buffalo from walking away as the carrier for its Giant credit card.
WASHINGTON - The Securities and Exchange Commission is scrutinising the rebates stock-account managers get for steering business to brokers.

NEW YORK - A federal jury awarded a secretary more than $5.3 million for arm, wrist, and hand injuries suffered from using Digital Equipment Corp. keyboards, the first finding of liability against a computer keyboard maker for such injuries.
